pages.text: Aspect gems are important for crafting various themed scepters as you progress on an upgrade path. They are created by interacting with the environment in various ways.$(br2)$(bold)For any aspect gem to be created, a $(l:amethyst_imbuement:imbuing/gem_of_promise)Gem of Promise$(/l) needs to be held in the off-hand$()
A blazing gem has a heart of fire. Create one by holding a Gem of Promise in your off-hand and withstanding a large amount of fire-type damage (fire, lava, etc).
A sparking gem is imbued with lightning. Create one by holding a Gem of Promise in your off-hand and getting struck by lightning.
A brutal gem is tough with a steely resolve. Create one by holding a Gem of Promise in your off-hand and taking damage from hostile mobs.
A lethal gem bleeds the essence of combat. Create one by holding a Gem of Promise in your off-hand and killing mobs.
A inquisitive gem has a curious mind. Create one by holding a Gem of Promise in your off-hand and subjecting yourself to many status effects.
A healers gem glows with life. Create one by holding a Gem of Promise in your off-hand and healing yourself (a lot). Eating counts.
